The sonic fan game wants to bring Sonic into the modern era of platformers with a faithful recreation of momentum based gameplay, drawing on mechanical and level design inspiration from recent metroidvania titles like “Hollow Knight” and “Ori and the Blind Forest,” coupled with an aesthetic grounded in 90s anime as seen in the Sonic CD Toei animations and the “Sonic the Hedgehog” OVA.

77459.name: Airsoft
77459.description: Airsoft is a new interactive game mixing exciting elements of First Person Shooters with the freedom of a mobile game.

61140.name: Ride 'Em Rigby: Regular Show
61140.description: Ride 'Em Rigby: Regular Show is a 2D action game from Cartoon Network.

176304.name: Pirate's Pension
176304.description: Where did I bury my treasure again?

107152.name: Decay Z : Space Survival
107152.description: After the earth fall in 2088 - a group of nations establishes a secret project called "iCarus" to send out people to find a new earth (Utopia). this spaceship will spent 200 years for traveling to "Utopia". Unfortunately , some supplys contain "Z-Virus" , people who contact with that supply get infested and mutated , the infested can not control itself and start attack everything.the scientist name "Sayame MiM" the leader of "iCarus" project try to protect the last group of survivors from infested by cut off the electricity of security door but it make power reactor damaged. The last group of survivors have to restore the system back and make everything back to normal. the time had pass until one of engineer in the spaceship wake up from hyper sleep. he will be the one who gonna tell us what is the rest of the story should be.

156111.name: The Tower Of TigerQiuQiu: The Deep The Hill
156111.description: AboutIt's harder to get to the top of the game, carefully avoiding falling boulders and organ flying knives. There will be an alert before the boulder falls, and flying knives will become more frequent as the level progresses. Bravely get the top chest.

24712.name: World of Animals: Pets 'n Pals Collection

27199.name: Phantom Halls
27199.description: Enter a haunted mansion and prepare to face the undead terrors that stalk the phantom halls! Squad up to survive the night using whatever you can find, but remember - you can’t kill what you can’t see, so be sure to bring a flashlight…

61100.name: A Tale of Survival
61100.description: A Tale of Survival is a randomly generated open world survival game from Dynamic Zero.

28338.name: Kickoff Legends
28338.description: Kickoff Legends is a multi-player, cross-platform football team management game. It's a real time football multi-player game that is fast and fun. Matches are played in real time. Any platform against any platform!

54320.name: Recovery Search & Rescue Simulation
54320.description:
Strap on your boots and hook up your compass - as a new recruit to Rescue Team One, you’ll need to use your expert tracking skills to locate a variety of important objects and missing people who have stumbled into the harsh and perilous dangers of your national park. 
 
Navigate woodland trails, deep ravines and fast-flowing rivers on the trail of a journalist looking for the thrill of adventure, or locate some missing pharmaceuticals to save a hiker’s life. Your skills are paramount for the safety of your visitors. 
 
However, it is not all walk in the park; the lush forest can quickly turn into a dangerous trek as you come across some of nature’s most dangerous obstacles, including tar pits, deep chasms and angry beasts.

155938.name: 天下为棋
155938.description: This is an oriental fantasy game of turn-based strategy. On the basis of the traditional turn-based strategy game, it incorporates a more rational growth model, stronger role mechanisms, deeper strategic caps, and rich collection of growth elements.

100298.name: Invasion
100298.description:
The end of the world, and there's something after you. 
 
A short horror Twine about sacrifice, survival, and relative humanity.

126795.name: Death To The Dragon Lord
126795.description: For over a millennia the land of Aforn has been under the tyrannical rule of the Dragon Lord. All attempts to overthrow him have led to near genocide, but the Dragon Lord's cruelty is so great that despite the consequences another revolt is brewing.

176303.name: Its a Pirate-Game!
176303.description: A top-down minimalist pixel game about dodging pirates and their bullets!

158039.name: Fox Spirit: A Two-Tailed Adventure
158039.description: Dazzle humanity or destroy it as a magical, two-tailed fox! Weave illusions, shapeshift, or control minds. You'll set the world on fire, one way or another.

56132.name: Dungeon Superballs
56132.description: A Challenging Indie 3D Isometric Platform Game. It's the previous version of the final game 'The Dungeon Power'

78085.name: Fireworks
78085.description: Free augmented reality game for the PS Vita where you detonate fireworks before they crash into the ground.

192464.name: Neon Racer
192464.description: Endless road, neon lights, palm trees. The game immerses you in the atmosphere of retrowave. Welcome to Neon Racer! Neon Racer is a car simulator game in which you drive along the endless road and avoid other cars.

180447.name: The Lost Residents
180447.description: You decide to take matters into your own hands to solve a missing people's case.

97040.name: Diner Bros
97040.description: Diner Bros is a frantic cooking and restaurant management game where you must cook and serve meals to your customers before they get too hungry. You just opened your diner. As the first customers take their seats, you rush to the kitchen. One customer doesn’t want tomato in his burger, while the other one wants a drink. Those tables won’t clean up themselves either… If you take too long, your customers will leave angry and hungry, and you’ll soon go out of business!

157144.name: Toaster Defense
157144.description: Shoot, dash, and smash enemies in this fast-paced tower defense platformer. Build turrets to aid in your defenses and find the deadliest combination. Protect the toaster -- at all costs!

170154.name: DCS World: F-5E - Aggressors Air Combat Maneuver Campaign
170154.description: The F-5E Aggressors ACM campaign puts you in the cockpit of an F-5E Tiger II, as a new Aggressor pilot with the 65th Aggressor Squadron at Nellis Air Force Base. Based on real world procedures you will fly as Red Air against Blue Air Forces.

28643.name: England Exchange
28643.description: An International Affair! Play as a (male or female) American college student spending a semester abroad in London. Build a new future by living, studying, working, and dating in England. Both straight and same-sex romances are available, but not all loves may have a happy ending...

128113.name: Magnet Fishing Simulator
128113.description: Are you bored of traditional fishing? Put your rod away and search in outdoor waters for ferromagnetic objects available to pull with a strong neodymium magnet. Find rare and valuable items, restore them, and sell!

10990.name: Thunder Wolves
10990.description:
Thunder Wolves is a third-person shoot-'em-up game.
Support the Thunder Wolves in their global battle against terrorism. Take part in varied operations and do whatever it takes to thwart the diabolical plans of your enemies! Defeat them once and for all, and save the world!

75789.name: All That Remains
75789.description: All That Remains is a 90's inspired eerily atmospheric adventure narrative that lets you experience one man’s life as he comes to terms with his final moments on an abandoned Earth.

49798.name: Puzzle & Tantei Collection
49798.description: Puzzle & Tantei Collection is a Miscellaneous game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 2003.

133158.name: Sound Science
133158.description: Greetings, future scientist! I am the Honorable, Sir Lord Dr. Professor Walrus, Ph.D., D.V.M., D.D.S., M.D., Esquire the Third! Together, you and I shall embark upon a journey to understand sound! Welcome to Sound Science!

71165.name: Before the Legacy
71165.description: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Sam Gray as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

134583.name: FORSPOKEN
134583.description: Forspoken is the culmination of Luminous Productions’ philosophy to create a completely new and fresh gaming experiences that fuses together the latest technologies with art.

80491.name: Auto Club Revolution
80491.description: Auto Club Revolution is a browser-based online racing game and car community. You'll be able to own, upgrade and customise officially licensed cars to create your ultimate online garage, then share them with friends, use them in multiplayer races or complete single player challenges.

107529.name: Cosmos Defense
107529.description: A strategy planetary defense game across the galaxy. Defend your territories while planing for your future.

137633.name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. Pack
137633.description: Based on season 2 of the Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. television series, this DLC adds a brand-new level, eleven characters, and an additional vehicle to your LEGO Marvel's Avengers journey!

7605.name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat
7605.description:
The events of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat unfold shortly after the end of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl. Having discovered about the open path to the Zone center, the government decides to hold a large-scale military "Fairway" operation aimed to take the CNPP under control. 
 
According to the operation's plan, the first military group is to conduct an air scouting of the territory to map out the detailed layouts of anomalous fields location. Thereafter, making use of the maps, the main military forces are to be dispatched. Despite thorough preparations, the operation fails. Most of the avant-garde helicopters crash. In order to collect information on reasons behind the operation failure, Ukraine's Security Service sends their agent into the Zone center. 
 
From now on, everything depends on you.

79885.name: The Lost Mind of Dr. Brain
79885.description: This game is the third in the Dr. Brain series. Solve logic, math, and other puzzling conundrums designed to stress your brain.

93105.name: Tremulous
93105.description:
Tremulous is a free, open source game that blends a team based FPS with elements of an RTS. 
 
Players can choose from 2 unique races, aliens and humans. Players on both teams are able to build working structures in-game like an RTS. These structures provide many functions, the most important being spawning. The designated builders must ensure there are spawn structures or other players will not be able to rejoin the game after death. Other structures provide automated base defense (to some degree), healing functions and much more...

31780.name: Mu Cartographer
31780.description:
Mu Cartographer is a contemplative game experience that combines colourful sandbox and experimental treasure hunt. 
 
Learn to operate an abstract machine in order to shape and explore colourful landscapes and find the mysteries hidden in a shifting world.

150250.name: Jurassic Extinction
150250.description: Survive an island, in an unknown time and place. Encounter dinosaurs, humans, and find a way back home, fight and kill to find your way...

190134.name: Galactic Frontier
190134.description: Galactic Frontier is a story focused Sci-Fi explorative twin stick shooter. Embark on an intergalactic adventure in the chaotic and war torn expanse of what was the Milky Way. Fight alongside rebels or repress them! Become a pirate or submit to the Machine Plague, choose your own destiny.

192500.name: Solitaire Bonbon
192500.description: Cook lots of sweets and enjoy it! 200 levels in the sweet world theme!

53810.name: Time To Die: Adventures
53810.description: Embark on a dangerous journey through winding caverns and treacherous ruins, collecting treasures and battling monsters! Time To Die: Adventures is a top-down dungeon-crawler, inspired by classic arcade games and a love of adventure.

79112.name: CoreTechs Tactics
79112.description: Fair-to-play tactical wargaming meets collectible deck-building, with an emphasis on community creation.

59989.name: Sweet Clown: Gozen San-ji no Okashi na Doukeshi

28284.name: Jay and Silent Bob: Chronic Blunt Punch
28284.description:
Jump in the shoes of Lunch Box and Mr. Snoogans in a colorful Side-scrolling 2.5D over-the-top multiplayer brawler! Play as the dynamic duo alone or with a friend in a tag team combo fight fest. Destroy your enemies with fists, feet, and the magic of self-esteem destroying shit talk while you embark on a mission to find your long lost pot customers trapped in an Orwellian shopping center.

Jay and Silent Bob: Chronic Blunt Punch is a colorful side-scrolling tag-team beat-em-up where players swap back and forth between our heroes on the fly or perform special moves simultaneously with a friend. Our heroes embark on an epic adventure from the humble corners where they ply their trade to the gates of hell itself.

103380.name: Bloons TD 6
103380.description: The Bloons are back and better than ever! Craft your perfect defense from a combination of awesome monkey towers, upgrades, Heroes, and activated abilities, then pop every last Bloon that comes your way!

104871.name: Fatman Simulator
104871.description: Fatman Simulator is a simulation game in which you can experience the life of a overweight programmer. Try your best to lose weight and earn a better life!

38918.name: Avabel Online
38918.description:
AVABEL ONLINE is a 3D-MMORPG that delivers the best in smartphone graphics. 
Users can enjoy the games exhilarating features, such as smooth combo strikes, sequential attacks with jump action, etc in the same world. Enjoy hunting monsters and quests in the MMO field "Main Tower" (multiplayer field), or the "Dungeon" in the MO Field (Played by parties or by solo), the PvP (Player versus player), or the tower scramble where a max of 1000 players fight each other in real time all with the best graphics.

180521.name: Missing Stars: Act One
180521.description: A visual novel about mental disorders and the people they affect. Made with Ren'Py.

94508.name: Fengse Huanxiang 3: Zui yu Fa de Zhenhunge

180381.name: In an attempt to save the innocents

100072.name: You Don't Know Jack
100072.description: The original game in Jellyvision's (later Jackbox Games) comedic trivia series.

54452.name: ArkanoidSmoking
54452.description:
Unusual arkanoid with interesting levels and music back on personal computers with unusual graphics! 
Who knows, maybe this game will help you to quit Smoking.

64841.name: Pendulous
64841.description: A challenging pendulum trip through a steam-driven clockwork world. Swing from anchor to anchor, using shifting pipes and steam jets to hurry you to a fast finish.

100832.name: ModernArcheryVR
100832.description: Reset and refresh your mind with VR and Competitive Archery!

40252.name: S.S. Mission
40252.description: S.S. Mission was produced by Comad in 1992.

81114.name: NeuroMatrix
81114.description: NEO Near - Earth - Object. Sci-fi action adventure puzzle video game. Futuristic design 3d environment & first person view. You are an artificial specialist and take part in a space expedition, whose mission is to explore and investigate a strange and mysterious space installation.

103146.name: Abyss and Dark: The King's Secret Pledge

160358.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Black Hill Fortress MP045
160358.description: Tiger Tank 59 is a top-down shooting game. In this game, players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 045.

62291.name: Jeff the Killer Revenge
62291.description: Jeff the Killer Revenge is an exploratory horror game where players do all that they can to stay alive whilst a supernatural serial killer stalks them.

68180.name: SHOPPING SIMULATOR MULTIPLAYER
68180.description: SHOPPING SIMULATOR MULTIPLAYER is a brand new contest simulator game. Try to put everything into the shopping cart ,which is listed in your shopping list before the other customers! Hurry, because time’s up!You can be juggler to win and steal the products from others or you can knocked over shopping cart of the other players.Be circumspect and fast enough and be the best customer!

143959.name: Louie
143959.description: Old school platform puzzle action. Find all the ice cream in each level, and escape! Hunt for secrets. Use the in-game level editor to craft your own unique challenges!

141947.name: Space Loner Chronicle
141947.description: Sea Green is totally alone in space, and she like, loves it, of course!

62141.name: Space Live: Advent of the Net Idols
62141.description: Humanity abandoned reality and decided to reside in Net Space. Net Space is divided into a number of factions, and every four years, they hold a concert for control of all the Spaces. With such high stakes at play, the heated battle between Space Idols shall commence!

130232.name: GrandNestling
130232.description: 《GrandNestling》 is an detective Gal game, whose game object is to use limited clues to investigate and uncover crimes, as well as to help the main character Lanye to free himself from the shadow of a car incident and to find his life goal.

42694.name: Super Stardust Delta
42694.description:
Blast through an addictive shooter where one wrong move could be your last. 
 
Create incredible black holes using the touchscreen, blast asteroids to pieces using the dual analog sticks and deploy devastating shock waves with motion sensitive gameplay. 
Enjoy classic gameplay modes from Super Stardust HD and Super Stardust Portable, as well as new modes exclusive to PS Vita. 
Shoot your way to the top of the intergalactic leaderboards via PlayStation Network.

128452.name: Former Future
128452.description: Former Future is a strategic top-down 2D shooter where you face an invading alien threat on the frontier world of Saturn and its neighboring moons.

100157.name: Morkredd
100157.description:
The Orb is your fate.  
  
Morkredd is a tense, physics-based co-op puzzle game for one to two players combining skill-based puzzle-solving, a challenging balance of light and shadow, and a dark world full of secrets to unlock. 
 
The Orb Calls for Two: Morkredd is best played as a couch co-op experience. Heed the Orb’s call with a friend or prove your loyalty alone by mastering the unique dual-character controls. 
Your Path is the Orb: You are the Orb’s protector, and the Orb’s light is yours. Survive and master over 60 puzzles while avoiding the shadows caused by your partner and the environment. 
The Orb is Your Only Friend: An endless abyss of deadly shadows conceal dangers in this cold, dark world. Stay with the Orb if you want to stay alive. 
Gaze into the Orb: Discover ancient secrets about the Orb hidden in the darkness.

4839.name: Halo: Spartan Assault
4839.description: Enlist as a Spartan soldier and sharpen your tactical skills in battle! Set between the events of Halo 3 and Halo 4, Halo: Spartan Assault, developed by 343 Industries in conjunction with Vanguard Games, is a new chapter within the award-winning Halo universe. Spanning over 30 missions in vibrant, dangerous worlds, dive deeper into the backstory of Human-Covenant wars and the origins of the Spartan Ops program.

75383.name: Mystery Stone from Heaven
75383.description: Mystery Stone from Heaven is a decoding and exploration game. Player would act as a prehistoric archaeologist. In 2008, he excavated a shinning fragment in Shuidongou. After researching historical document, he got to know this stone consist three parts and its name is ‘Po’. He traversed to Shuidonggou Canyon which existed in 40,000 years ago. Furthermore, he found that this canyon was made by a huge maze. In this journey, you would meet lots prehistoric animals, learnt skills from stone age, collect the skeletons of an elegant princess and know about the secret about this stone. After got the second stone fragment, player would pass through the Great Wall in Ming dynasty and seek the last fragment of stone.

62612.name: Favela Wars
62612.description: Turn-based strategy, browser-based, online game set in a dystopic Rio de Janeiro in the year 2040.

58509.name: Koushien: Konpeki no Sora
58509.description: The final game in the Koushien series

180531.name: So you think you can Chad?: An Incel Dating Sim
180531.description: Incel asks Chad's help to get girls to like him. You won't believe what happens next.

114355.name: LOTUS Minigames: United Nations
114355.description: A very basic implementation of a shedding-type card game. Play with your friends and be the best of you!

26370.name: Abode
26370.description:
In Abode you'll visit a Sci-fi noir apartment. Inspired by "escape the room" games. 
You will pick up, inspect, open, repair or utilize objects or furniture in the room in order to unveil all its secrets.

120610.name: A Kingdom of Flesh and Stone
120610.description: KoFnS is a resource gathering survival game with plans leading into strategy style game play. There are three primary staged objectives we wish to hit with the game to get it where we wanted it to go and hope you enjoy playing and testing it out as it makes that journey.

176289.name: Cursed Island
176289.description: One man. One desire. A lot of skeletons.

146061.name: Sakura Forest Girls
146061.description: Yaya, a plucky young huntress, and Aiyana, a shy girl born into a family of shamans, go on a journey to find their missing childhood friend, Koko. Along the way they meet a mischievous witch, Maia, and sparks fly.

49641.name: Cesti to Meigurumi-tachi no Mahou no Bouken: Kisekko Gurumii
49641.description: Cesti to Meigurumi-tachi no Mahou no Bouken: Kisekko Gurumii is an Adventure game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2003.

96105.name: Dodge Club Pocket
96105.description: The underground ravers of Dodge Club invite YOU to play in their pixel dance party. Dodge the red hot fireball and electric spark in a variety of unique minigame challenges, each one more wild than the last! As you play, you'll even unlock mysterious bonus content in the form of "presents", including new characters, comics by Linzb0t, extra music, and more. Speck and her raver friends can't wait to meet you, so join the club now on your Nintendo 3DS with Dodge Club Pocket!

10316.name: Fate of the Pharaoh
10316.description: The greedy enemy wanted the treasures of Egypt. Long time attacks exhausted the magnificent realm of Pharaoh. Days of glory are far behind now, wrapped in dust of endless deserts. But, there's hope! The enemy finally fled! Take the role of brave young Pharaoh's adviser and raise the golden cities of Egypt once again in this fun and beautiful strategy/management game. Construct homes for your people, set-up production, trade, please gods, fight crocodiles and dangerous cobras while build monuments and famous wonders of Egyptian realm. And, be visited by aliens from space that will teach you secrets of how to build the mighty pyramids! All this, and much more in Fate of the Pharaoh!

27427.name: Journey To The Center Of The Earth
27427.description: Journey to the Center of the Earth is a 2D platformer about exploring giant caves and dying of thirst. Based on the Jules Verne novel, players control three adventurers with unique powers and have to make their way through 18 expansive levels, solve puzzles, avoid traps and find the well hidden secret at the center of the Earth.

56124.name: Empire of Angels II
56124.description: Second game of Empire of Angels series, released on MS-DOS.

80017.description: "300" is a bowling themed pinball machine.

46160.name: Oh Mummy Genesis
46160.description:
Oh Mummy Genesis is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive game developed and published by 1985 Alternativo. It was released in October 2012 and serves as an unofficial update to the game Oh Mummy, originally released by Gem Software for the Amstrad CPC, MSX and ZX Spectrum in 1984. As well as providing a port of the original version, Oh Mummy Genesis features an updated version with enhanced graphics and sound. 
 
1985 Alternativo released the ROM as freeware in 2013, after stocks of boxed copies of the game ran out.

72296.name: Fedora Spade: Death Wears a Fedora

176951.name: Acolyte: Ascend
176951.description: A bitsy interactive fiction game with a hint of dating sim about an acolyte and their deity reckoning with the end of the world.

144569.name: Sanabi
144569.description: SANABI is an exhilarating stylish dystopian action-platformer. Play as a legendary retired veteran and use your signature prosthetic arm to jump over cliffs and skyscrapers, zip through bullets and traps and defeat powerful enemies.

110773.name: Cartoony Cars 2
110773.description: Cartoony Cars 2 is a physics-based puzzle game about getting the car to the flag with limited resources. When you hit "GO!" the car drives by itself. Use sticks, boostpads, portals and the (not so) realistic physics engine to guide the duck to the flag!

73480.name: No Surrender: Battle of the Bulge

96811.name: Duck Warfare
96811.description: Protect your park from being taken from you by the GÜSCO corporation!

76085.name: Arcade Classics 3D
76085.description: 6 Arcade games in modern themes and 3D environments.
